title: Motto
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Motto par David Guetta
[Lil Uzi Vert, G-Eazy & Mally Mall]
Ay, Yuh, Woop
Steve Aoki
Mally Mall
David Guetta
Ay, ay, ay, ay

[Lil Uzi Vert]
Uh, yeah, money don't fall
Yeah, different day, different episodes
Yeah, kick a J, was a penny love (what?)
Yeah, 20k in an envelope
Yeah, Margiela with the strap
Yeah, no shoestring, what you tripping for (tripping for)
Ay, red light scan and she digital (digital)

Ay, new Vera Wang cost a car note (car note)
That new Cilane cost a car note (skrt)
Walk around with my Fendi goggles (yeah)
Yeah, walk around with a young model (uh)
Ay, pick her up, just like a Tahoe (yeah)

[Lil Uzi Vert]
Yeah, fresh down 'till my socks though
Ay, gettin' money like I won the lotto
Uh, uh, yeah, our hunnids that's my motto (yeah)
Yeah, I don't wanna uh, like she swallow (yuh)

[Lil Uzi Vert]
Yuh, bitch my motto, bitch my, bitch my motto (yuh)
Bitch my motto, bitch my, bitch my motto (yuh)
I don't wanna uh, like she swallow
Bitch my motto, bitch my motto

That' my
Bitch my motto
I don't wanna uh, like she swallow

Yih, uh, pretty girls that's my clientele
Phone calls, my accountant tell me I did well (you did well, Gerald)
Yeah, you don't do this much I can tell (I can tell)
First class the parents courtesy of YSL
Thank you [?]
Rick Owens with the drawstrings (brrp, brrp)
Pretty fly, white guy playing offspring (good it, good it, ooh)
Ooh, locked down, ooh, offspring
Ay, with your girlfriend squeaked in a bench frames (ay, ay, ay, ooh)

Yeah, red Balenciaga socks though (socks though)
Yeah, big bank is colossal (wuh)
New Ferrari coupe cars with Picasso (ay)
I don't wanna uh, like she swallow (yeah)

Ay, gettin' money like I wanna lie though

Yeah, I don't wanna uh, like she swallow (yuh)

Bitch my motto, bitch my motto (yuh)
